Claim #2: "SafeMode is complex and difficult to manage."

Pure's Advantage: SafeMode is designed for simplicity and ease of management. The Pure1 Enhanced SafeMode Management feature allows customers to increase retention periods for SafeMode Protection Groups on their own without opening a support case. This feature, along with the Pure1 management platform, simplifies the configuration and management of SafeMode, making it accessible even for non-storage administrators.
